email_content:
Hi Susan,

As discussed, please find below the proposal for our upcoming team retreat. Let me know if you’d like to add or adjust anything.

— — —
Team Retreat Proposal

Objective
Create an inclusive, engaging experience that brings the Bright Horizons Marketing Solutions team together, strengthens collaboration, and celebrates our diverse interests.

Key Elements
1. Activities   
   • Outdoor: Guided hike suitable for all fitness levels.  
   • Creative: Group painting / art workshop.  
   • Team-building: Facilitated trust-building and problem-solving sessions.

2. Venue   
   • Fully accessible facilities (mobility-friendly rooms & common areas).  
   • On-site meeting space for workshops and breakout discussions.  
   • Nearby outdoor areas for optional recreation.

3. Meals & Dietary Needs   
   • Menus covering vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, and kosher preferences.  
   • Flexible buffet style to ensure everyone can choose what works for them.

4. Timing & Budget   
   • Two-day, one-night format (arrival early Day 1, departure late Day 2).  
   • Preliminary budget estimate: lodging, activities, meals, and transportation all-inclusive within our allocated retreat fund.

Next Steps
• Confirm preferred dates.  
• Finalize headcount.  
• Lock in venue and activity providers.  
• Send out RSVP and dietary survey.

Please review and share any feedback or suggestions when you have a moment.

Thanks!
[Your Name]
